title: Silver 5/4 support looking for ranked 5's team
body:
As the title says. Play most supports well, with Morgana, Thresh, Sona and Leona being some of my favs. Getting more Tahm time in atm for the meta. Also play a decent adc as well as a few jungle champs. Looking for chilled peeps, mature, who play regular. No ragers, kids etc. On every day, especially next 3 weeks.

Add: Coszack

Peace
